an3.10:1.1: “Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato tayo male appahaya yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an3.10:1.3: Dussilo ca hoti, dussilyamalancassa appahinam hoti;
an3.10:1.4: issuki ca hoti, issamalancassa appahinam hoti;
an3.10:1.5: macchari ca hoti, maccheramalancassa appahinam hoti.
an3.10:1.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato ime tayo male appahaya yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an3.10:2.1: Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato tayo male pahaya yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an3.10:2.3: Silava ca hoti, dussilyamalancassa pahinam hoti;
an3.10:2.4: anissuki ca hoti, issamalancassa pahinam hoti;
an3.10:2.5: amacchari ca hoti, maccheramalancassa pahinam hoti.
an3.10:2.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato ime tayo male pahaya yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
